page.title: 19LOCAL SHOPS
page.content: There are two groups of local shops and a grocer.The shops are mainly food shops and newsagents but in Queensway there are also a Post Office and a hairdressers.There are two hot food shops.On Wednesday when we went the busiest shop in Queensway was the newsagent and in the Precinct it was the grocer.We went on Wednesday morning and about 150 people went to the Precinct and about 154 people went into Queensway;most people we met were local and travelled there by car or on foot.They said they came two or three times a week.Many people thought the litter was terrible and there were too many things in the windows of some shops.Most people we interviewed said they wanted a chemist.
